AI Description: YAXT (Yet Another XTabulator) is a Python library for creating publication-ready quantitative tables with an emphasis on simplicity and customization. It provides a straightforward interface for generating tables directly from pandas DataFrames.
Core Features:
1. Creation of publication-ready quantitative tables
2. Customization options for table formatting
3. Direct integration with pandas DataFrames
4. Support for adding metadata to tables
5. Ability to export tables in various formats
General Tags: Python Library, Data Analysis, Table Generation
